name: TOONS WARFARE (Prototype)
description:
Hello! I'm goldmindbeaker. This is my first game ever uploaded to itch.io. This game is a 2d Battle Royale called TOONS WARFARE. There isn't much to do in this game, however I am uploading it in hopes of getting feedback on the movement and controls.

                                              CONTROLS

W = Jump

A = Move Left

D = Move Right

Shift = Run
